About.aboutMeDesc: Beginner Software Developer aspiring to become a FullStack Developer. Knowledgeable in JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Next.js, SQL, and ORMs.
About.aboutMeDesc2: I started programming in C in 2022 for microcontrollers. In 2023, I began my undergraduate studies in Computer Science, focusing mostly on basics of Java, OOP, and SQL. At the beginning of 2024, I decided to study Web Development on my own.
